 * entry_type Filter by item type 
 * All (folder + document 'notes' 
 * search_target Target of keyword search or identifier specification 
 * Document meta information (name, title, author): 'all' 
 * Document: 'documents' 'annotation_pattern' 
 * annotation_type Filter by type annotation type 
 <small> * search ('*') * 'document_body' 
 * Document body: 'document_body' </ small> 
 * All (highlight + handwritten): 'all' 
 * Highlights: 'highlights' 
 * Handwriting: 'handwritings' 
 * order_type Specify sort order in list 
 <small> * </ Small> 
 * Name - Ascending order: 'entry_name_asc' 
 * Name - The folder is grouped first in ascending order, the folders are grouped first in descending order, 'Modified_date_desc' 
 * Created date and time - Ascending order: 'created_date_asc' 
 * Created date and time - Descending order: 'created_date_desc' 
 * Edit date and time - Ascending order: 'modified_date_asc' 
 * Edit date and time - Descending order: 'modified_date_desc' 'reading_date_desc' 
 * Ascending order: 'title_asc' 
 * Title - Descending order: 'title_desc' 
 * Author - ascending order: n * Last viewed date and time - Ascending order: 'reading_date_asc' 
 * Last viewed date and time - 'author_sc' 
 * Author - Descending order: 'author_desc' 
 * File size - Ascending order: 'file_size_asc' 
 * File size - Descending order: 'file_size_desc'

parameters.description: Specify when split uploading ※ For details see Instruction

parameters.description: The revision to upload the file entity to specify the latest revision that the client knows about. The document is updated in Deneb after grasping on the client side, and the revision value to be managed is specified If there is a state different from target_revision, return error, do not do revision check if target_revision is not specified, do not specify target_revision when new uploading.

parameters.description: Hash value of the file entity calculated on the client side.

Request to connect to the access point after new Wi-Fi access point registration or change of registered access point setting 
 * Access point with the same SSID and same encryption method already registered 
 * static_address, gateway, network_mask, dns1, dns2 are mandatory if 
 * dhcp is 'false' 
 (static_address, network_mask, dns1 is not empty, gateway, dns2 Proxy_port is required (empty character is acceptable) 
 * If eap, eap_phase 2, eap_id, eap_idid, eap_cacert, eap_cert are required if security is 'eap'. 
 * If proxy is 'true', proxy_host and proxy_port are required (Null character is acceptable.) 
 * When changing the setting of registered access point, specify all items that have not been changed 
 * exceptionally passwd only, unmodified or empty character 'no change' Interpret
